Header.title: Collaborative Decision Making
Header.paragraph: A collaborative decision making platform for organizations to save time, remove bias, and make informed group decisions.

About.paragraph: DecisionHub is a digital end-to-end decision making platform that allows organizations to easily make unbiased group decisions involving multiple stakeholders.
About.paragraph2: Our web platform handles the interactions between all stakeholders including the admins, applicants and reviewers.

OurGoal.paragraph: We believe every applicant should have the oppourtunity to be reviewed in a fair way. We believe every admin should have the tools to make the best informed decisions free of bias. We are committed to ensuring both of these.

Services.name: Forms Tool
Services.text: Full form functionality including creating forms with various question types, generating a custom link to send to applicants, and allowing applicants to apply via the link.

Services.name: Review Tool
Services.text: Customizable decision matrix controlled by the admins that allows the reviewers of the decision process to log into the platform and make independent and unbiased decisions.

Services.name: Admin Portal
Services.text: Throughout the review process, there is a full admin portal allowing organization admins to track progress of reviewers and view & export the final aggregated review data.

Pricing.name: Silver Plan
Pricing.text: Basic access into the DecisionHub platform, able to create a program and get started on making better decisions.

Pricing.name: Gold Plan
Pricing.text: Privileged access to the DecisionHub platform, able to create multiple programs and customize forms.

Pricing.name: Platinum Plan
Pricing.text: Highest level of access to the DecisionHub platform, able to create many programs, customize forms, and have large number of reviewers and admins on the platform!

Features.title: Forms Creation
Features.text: Organization admins can create and publish an online form for applicants to apply to with various different question types.

Features.title: Forms Submission
Features.text: Applicants can go to a link without logging in and apply to a form, automatically piping the data to the internal platform.

Features.title: Review Tool
Features.text: Committee review members can log into the platform and perform independent, unbiased, reviews on all applications within the round.

Features.title: Aggregated Data
Features.text: Admins can view aggregated review data from all reviewers on an admin portal to help guide the final decision making process.
